direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manipulate JSON objects, with sortJSONObject focusing on sorting keys and addKeyValue on adding key-value pairs.
Both methods interact with JSON objects, with sortJSONObject sorting keys and pullValue removing a specific key-value pair.
Both methods involve creating or manipulating JSON objects with similar control flows and exception handling.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the state of the JSON object, with addKeyValue adding key-value pairs and sortJSONObject sorting them.
pullValue modifies the JSON object by removing a key-value pair, which can affect the sorting in sortJSONObject.
Both methods handle JSON objects and can throw similar JSONException errors, useful for asserting expected outcomes.
